name: Megingjord
shortDescription:
Thor's Belt of Divine Strength Megingjord (Old Norse: megin "power, strength" + gjord "belt, girdle") is one of Thor's three
                   ...
fullDescription:
Thor's Belt of Divine Strength Megingjord (Old Norse: megin "power, strength" + gjord "belt, girdle") is one of Thor's three
                    essential possessions, along with his hammer Mjolnir and his iron gloves Jarngreipr. When Thor
                    fastens this magical belt around his waist, his already immense divine strength doubles, making
                    him the mightiest of all beings in the Nine Worlds.
